findings.lung_bases: Clear aside from mild basal dependent atelectasis.
findings.gallbladder: Distended with a small amount of perihepatic free fluid.
findings.liver: Subtle hyperemia of the adjacent hepatic parenchyma noted; no concerning lesions.
findings.biliary_ducts: No intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilation.
findings.small_bowel: No signs of ileus or obstruction.
findings.appendix: Not visualized; no secondary signs of appendicitis.
findings.colon: Mild fecal load; diverticulosis without diverticulitis.
findings.seminal_vesicle: Persistent asymmetry and prominence of the right seminal vesicle.
findings.prostate: Prominent, measuring 6 cm in transverse dimension.
findings.pelvic_adenopathy: No pelvic sidewall or inguinal adenopathy.
findings.bones: No worrisome lytic or blastic osseous lesions.
